attributes.action: Revise The Part P Qualification Process
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allow genuine electricians,with recognised qualifications or min of 20yrs exp or nearing retirement age to comply with part p of building regs without the need and cost of full scope schemes.To include site visit/view samples of work without the in depth examination full scope or fully Niceic registered people go thro.
